course.title: The Modern Mediterranean: Connections and Conflicts between Europe and North Africa
course.description: This course examines relations between European and North African societies, economies, and peoples from the age of "Barbary Piracy" through colonial conquests, anti-colonial nationalism and decolonialization, to post-World War II migrations and reverberations from the "Arab Spring" of 2011. Students will consider crucial turning points in European-North African relations and will write a substantial research paper focusing in on some aspect of Mediterranean history in the modern era.
